subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Braves’ Craig Kimbrel is a hitter’s nightmare: his fastball, reaching into the upper 90s, has an extra gear. Last season, he struck out more than half the batters he faced.
snippet: The Braves’ Craig Kimbrel is a hitter’s nightmare: his fastball, reaching into the upper 90s, has an extra gear. Last season, he struck out more than half the batters he faced.
